activities: Sentient collects personal data from individuals in the EEA or Switzerland who are (i) prospective, current or former partners, vendors, suppliers, customers, or clients of Sentient, (ii) visitors to a Sentient website, including but not limited to icanmakeitbetter.com and its subdomains, and (iii) users of Sentient services.  Sentient also may collect personal data from individuals on behalf of its customers.  In such instances, Sentient is acting as a data processor and will process such personal data only on behalf of and under the instructions of its customer.  For example, Sentient performs market research and other services on behalf of its customers, and its customers may request that Sentient operate surveys and forums on their behalf, which may involve the collection of personal data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online and manually processed data; customer data
